unnormalised: Delhi Parents Panic as CBSE Class 10 Results "Preponed" to 13/05/2024! Education Ministry Claims It’s Not Their Fault. Initial reports suggest a coding error – someone accidentally hit the "prepone" button instead of "postpone," classic! Sources close to the board claim teachers are now marking papers at warp speed, fueled by endless cups of chai and the sheer terror of angry parents. Prepare for frantic calls to tuition teachers at 2:00 AM.
normalised: Delhi Parents Panic as C-B-S-E Class ten Results "Preponed" to thirteenth May two thousand and twenty four! Education Ministry Claims It’s Not Their Fault. Initial reports suggest a coding error – someone accidentally hit the "prepone" button instead of "postpone," classic! Sources close to the board claim teachers are now marking papers at warp speed, fueled by endless cups of chai and the sheer terror of angry parents. Prepare for frantic calls to tuition teachers at two zero zero A-M.

unnormalised: Rumours abound that the new cutoff for science stream in top schools will now be an impossible 99.99%. Students are allegedly resorting to ancient Vedic maths techniques (and maybe a little bit of cheating, shhh!). One anxious parent from DPS Rohini was overheard saying, "My beta will now have to become an auto-rickshaw driver! All thanks to this prepone nonsense!" Stay tuned for live updates from outside CBSE headquarters – it's gonna be wilder than a Bollywood climax.
normalised: Rumours abound that the new cutoff for science stream in top schools will now be an impossible ninety nine point nine nine percent. Students are allegedly resorting to ancient Vedic maths techniques (and maybe a little bit of cheating, shhh!). One anxious parent from D-P-S Rohini was overheard saying, "My beta will now have to become an auto-rickshaw driver! All thanks to this prepone nonsense!" Stay tuned for live updates from outside C-B-S-E headquarters – it's gonna be wilder than a Bollywood climax.

unnormalised: And for all the students who were planning that relaxing Goa trip after exams? Well, better prepone your study sessions instead! Don't worry, at least you'll have plenty of hilarious memes to share on 14/05/2024, regardless of the outcome. Remember kids, a marksheet is just a piece of paper, but the trauma of CBSE exams is forever! All the best!
